By default the stock field will not be l: By default the stock field will not be locked so that your mapper imports can update it. If you want to lock the stock field and prevent imports from overriding it, please click here.

process_modal.information: Are you sure you want to process this order ? This action is irreversible.
process_modal.title: Process order: {{orderId}}

Do you want to cancel all items without: Do you want to cancel all items without invoices (Full) or only some items (Partial) ?
Do you want to cancel the whole order (F: Do you want to cancel the whole order (Full) or only some items (Partial) ?
Do you want to export all orders listed: Do you want to export all orders listed below ?
Do you want to mark the whole order or o: Do you want to mark the whole order or only some items as received ?
During migration period, it is still pos: During migration period, it is still possible to create order in old workflow (IZBERG workflow v1). It is however recommended to create orders in new workflow (IZBERG workflow v2), to avoid orders being read-only after some time
Enter a note that will be sent to the bu: Enter a note that will be sent to the buyer

If the return's status in not 'Package r: If the return's status in not 'Package received', the return will automatically be to updated to this status

Once the return request accepted, the bu: Once the return request accepted, the buyer will send you back the products for an exchange or a refund.
Or create a new refund if you don't want: Or create a new refund if you don't want to attach the refund to a return request
Payment has not been authorized. Please: Payment has not been authorized. Please try again later.
Payment term to apply for payment of all: Payment term to apply for payment of all cart items
Please check that this order is valid be: Please check that this order is valid before creating it
Please choose below the return method:: Please choose below the return method:
Please choose items that will fill the c: Please choose items that will fill the cart, note that items in listing below are active and available
Please follow the step for the order cre: Please follow the step for the order creation.
Please go to the merchant backoffice to: Please go to the merchant backoffice to set a shipping option
Please note that the export may take sev: Please note that the export may take several hours !
Please select a reason for returning the: Please select a reason for returning the order (optional)

Please select shipping and billing addre: Please select shipping and billing addresses
Please select the items you want to refu: Please select the items you want to refund

Please wait for the customer to send you: Please wait for the customer to send you back the products.
Product or product package is used / dam: Product or product package is used / damaged
Refund created ! Please go to the refund: Refund created ! Please go to the refund page to manage it
Select item(s) to mark as received: Select item(s) to mark as received
Send the message as Modizy (will be as m: Send the message as Modizy (will be as merchant otherwise)
Shipped quantities for item {{name}} (SK: Shipped quantities for item {{name}} (SKU: {{sku}}) cannot exceed {{quantity}} (Qty ordered - Qty invoiced)
Shipping fees to be refunded must be bet: Shipping fees to be refunded must be between 0 and {{max}}
Shipping has already been refunded of an: Shipping has already been refunded of an amount of {{amount}}
The information you enter here is for yo: The information you enter here is for your use only and will not be displayed to the buyer
The order is not confirmed, so please ca: The order is not confirmed, so please cancel the order
The return requests have been created: The return requests have been created
The user has requested a <strong>product: The user has requested a product exchange. Click on the button "I have sent new package" to close the return request.
The user has requested a <strong>refund<: The user has requested a refund. Click on the button "Create Refund" to finish the process.
The value entered here will add to the t: The value entered here will add to the total amount refunded as an additional refund
There are no items to be shipped. Create: There are no items to be shipped. Create a draft invoice with shipping charges only.
This credit note is not ready for downlo: This credit note is not ready for download yet. Please try again later
This feature is in beta-test, it is not: This feature is in beta-test, it is not accessible to all users yet
This is a debug order, you can confirm,: This is a debug order, you can confirm, cancel, click the send button.. But please dont send the product!
This item has already been refunded of a: This item has already been refunded of an amount of {{amount}}
This order is in read-only mode. All act: This order is in read-only mode. All actions that might modify its status, and some other actions (returns, refunds, document uploads...) are prohibited.
This order need a shipping address. Plea: This order need a shipping address. Please go to step addresses and set one.
Title: Title
Unselected items will be cancelled. This: Unselected items will be cancelled. This action can not be undone.
VAT collected by operator for this order: VAT collected by operator for this order
Warning: check that the refund you want: Warning: check that the refund you want to cancel has not gone through your PSP
We are currently charging the customer c: We are currently charging the customer credit card. This should take a few minutes.

workflow_migration.announcement_operator_description:
Dear Customer,

A migration of order status workflow is planned on this application. The migration is scheduled from {{from_date}} to {{to_date}}.

With this migration, we aim to simplify the order workflows and make it more user friendly, as well as more robust.

The migration might have impact on your integration. Please read the announcement or contact your account manager to know more.
workflow_migration.announcement_operator_title: An order workflow migration is planned
workflow_migration.operator_description:
Dear Customer,

We are currently doing a migration of order status workflow on this application. The migration is scheduled from {{from_date}} to {{to_date}}.

With this migration, we aim to simplify the order workflows and make it more user friendly, as well as more robust. During the migration you might see orders with different status and actions than usual in the listing and in the detail pages.

Note that after {{read_only_date}}, all actions on orders from the previous workflow will be prohibited.

Please read the announcement link below or contact your account manager to know more.
workflow_migration.seller_description:
Dear Customer,

We are currently doing a migration of order status workflow on this application. The migration is scheduled from {{from_date}} to {{to_date}}.

With this migration, we aim to simplify the order workflows and make it more user friendly, as well as more robust. During the migration you might see orders with different status and actions than usual in the listing and in the detail pages.

Note that after {{read_only_date}}, all actions on orders from the previous workflow will be prohibited.

Please read the announcement link below or contact your account manager to know more.

You are about to cancel this order, this: You are about to cancel this order, this operation cannot be undone
You are about to delete a cart (id: {{id: You are about to delete a cart (id: {{id}})
You are about to mark this parcel as shi: You are about to mark this parcel as shipped and it doesn’t have a tracking number. Once a parcel is shipped, the tracking number and the tracking url will no longer be editable. Be sure to fill out the information before performing this action.
You are creating a new cart, please fill: You are creating a new cart, please fill in required fields
You are trying to return more items than: You are trying to return more items than available !
You can add your package tracking inform: You can add your package tracking information to allow your customers to follow the package shipping.
You can find listed here the carts assoc: You can find listed here the carts associated with this user. Please select a cart or create a new one.
You can leave a message to the buyer: You can leave a message to the buyer
You can mark this order as received beca: You can mark this order as received because you are an operator of this marketplace
You can refund several return requests f: You can refund several return requests from the same order all at once.
You can select below a reason for this c: You can select below a reason for this cancellation:
You cannot create more than {{limit}} re: You cannot create more than {{limit}} refunds for a single order
You must accept them all first: You must accept them all first
You must choose a variation to add this: You must choose a variation to add this offer to the cart
You must select at least one item to mar: You must select at least one item to mark it as received !
You must select at least one item to ret: You must select at least one item to return to proceed !
You must select at least one item when m: You must select at least one item when making a partial cancel
You must select at least one item when making a partial refund
You must select at least one item when making a partial send
You will find in this tab all orders tha: You will find in this tab all orders that have a return in progress
Your invoice is being generated. It may: Your invoice is being generated. It may take a few seconds.
{{item}} has already been refunded for a: {{item}} has already been refunded for an amount of {{refundedAmount}}
